DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore caregiver stress , family functioning , social support family resilience family whose child acute lymphoblastic leukemia . The significantly correlation among caregiver stress , family functioning , social support family resilience also explore .
DOC.brief_title: The Related Factors With Resilience Caregivers Whose Child With Leukemia
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosed acute lymphoblastic leukemia child , child cancer still alive age 18 year age . 2 . Has complete guide treatment regimen remission . 3 . Caregiver Taiwanese language communicator . Children metastatic cancer end chemical treatment one year
